data.title: WATCH: See LeBron James' Ohio Home from a Drone
data.meta_description: WATCH: See LeBron James' Ohio Home from a Drone - Fairlawn-Bath, OH - Check out this video captured from a drone flying over LeBron's sprawling estate in Bath, Ohio.
data.text:
BATH, OH â€” LeBron James bought this Bath Township property in 2003 at the age of 18 and went on to build a 30,000-square-foot mansion worth $9,200,000 on the land. The 19-room house estate features six bedrooms, eight full baths 6 half baths, a recording studio, a two-lane bowling alley, a casino, theater, sports bar, aquarium, barbershop and a main bedroom suite with a two-story walk-in closet. And that's just on the inside.

The outside of LeBron's sprawling estate can be seen in the drones-eye-view video below.

Outdoor garden including labyrinth made of hedges? Check. Full-sized outdoor swimming pool? Check. Full-sized outdoor basketball court? Check. In fact, there's not much that this home doesn't have.
